import s from './comment.module.css' import {changeLikesAndDislikesActionCreator} from './../../redux/reducers/commentsR' const CommentBlock = (props)=>{ return (
{props.staticInfo.author}
{props.staticInfo.place}
{props.staticInfo.content}
{props.dynamicInfo.likes - props.dynamicInfo.dislikes}
) } export default CommentBlock;
